bug.author: yubozhao
bug.summary: [Bug]Incorrect endpoint API description on swagger UI
bug.description:
Describe the bug When a user adds a docstring on an API endpoint, that docstring should be the description on the Swagger UI page. RIght now the default message is displayed instead. class MyService(bentoml.BentoService): @bentoml.api(...) def predict(self, input): """This message should be displayed. """ Instead of the default message in the screenshot. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/670949/100968382-17b82a80-34e6-11eb-9ec8-99b12a0ef04a.png></denchmark-link>
To Reproduce Expected behavior Screenshots/Logs Environment:
OS: [e.g. MacOS 10.14.3] Python Version [e.g. Python 3.7.1] BentoML Version [e.g. BentoML-0.8.6]
Additional context
